h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: While it's tempting to leave the shadows to Zhu Bajie to fight on his own, you're much better off repositioning yourself to take on the clones (and you may even want to summon your own clones if you can find some breathing room.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Final Encounter - Mahavira Hall'.
The content is as follows:
While it's tempting to leave the shadows to Zhu Bajie to fight on his own, you're much better off repositioning yourself to take on the clones (and you may even want to summon your own clones if you can find some breathing room.
